example.eg: Before you do anything, think about the possible effects of your actions.
example.egtrans: 在做任何事情前，请考虑一下你行为的后果。

example.eg: The government intervention had no effect.
example.egtrans: 政府的干预没有任何效果。

example.eg: This make-up creates a lovely effect.
example.egtrans: 这种化妆品会营造一种可爱的效果。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 给人的印象或者感受, 效果

dsense.name: effect
dsense.guideword: often plural (visual, audio device) (灯光、音响等的)

example.eg: The band used some lighting effects in their show.
example.egtrans: 乐队在演出中利用了灯光效果。

example.eg: He had very few personal effects.
The government effected change through its policy of taxation.
example.egtrans: 政府通过税收政策引发了变革。

example.eg: The effect of his look was clear.  He was very angry.
example.egtrans: 他的表情意思很清楚：他很生气。

example.eg: This paper discusses the production of mechanical effect.
example.egtrans: 这篇论文探讨了机械效应的产生。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 后果, 事后影响, 副作用, 后作用

example.eg: The law of cause and effect (Karma) is an important principle in Buddhism.

dsense.name: come into force, come into effect

example.eg: The new law does not come into force until February of next year.
Wearing a scary mask on Halloween got the desired effect: everyone was scared.
Despite what its supporters say, studies show that the deterrent effect of the death sentence is negligible.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 威慑作用, 威慑效果, 威慑力

example.eg: The Tunisia Revolution triggered a domino effect in the region.
Temperatures are gradually rising globally due to the greenhouse effect.
Bright colors have a strong effect on mood.
Advertising takes a lot of money to have an effect.
The Internet is, in effect, the most detailed archive of our times.
example.egtrans: 实际上，互联网是我们时代最详细的存档。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在功效方面, 生效, 在实行中

example.eg: The new law has been in effect for a year now.
Inflation can be a knock-on effect of increased government spending.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 连带效应, 连带影响

dsense.name: long-term effect
dsense.guideword: often plural (impact extending into the future)

example.eg: The net result of all the conflict was poverty and more instability.
He really believed the pills he was taking were working but it was just a placebo effect.
The government should move immediately to put the law into effect.
When one person applauds and everyone else joins in, that's the ripple effect at work.
Side effects of this drug may include nausea and a skin rash.
example.egtrans: 这种药物的副作用可能导致恶心以及皮疹。

example.eg: Losing weight is a welcome side effect of fasting in Lent.
example.egtrans: 减重是一种大斋节受欢迎的副作用。

example.eg: A good action movie needs excellent sound effects.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 音响效果, 音效, 声音效果

dsense.name: special effect
dsense.guideword: usually plural (cinema, TV: visual created artificially)

example.eg: The film has lots of stunning special effects but no story.
Within half an hour the tablets took effect and the pain disappeared.
The new law takes effect from midnight on Sunday.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 带有这个意思, 大意如此

example.eg: Individually the performances were nothing special, but taken together the total effect was stunning.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 立刻生效, 立即有效
